MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth, affecting properties in Llangwyrfon  and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  repairs required to a broken piece of equipment on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:38PM on 26th Decemeber 2020.
